Then, as the countries cooperate..."},{"lineNumber":12550,"originalJapaneseLine":"　新王マジックは必ず、こう言われるだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"The new King Magic will surely be told this:"},{"lineNumber":12551,"originalJapaneseLine":"『あの大変な戦争で何もしなかった者が』とな」","translatedEnglishLine":"'He who did nothing during that terrible war.'\""},{"lineNumber":12552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ……っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":12553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今ならば、周囲のあらゆる者が、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it is now, everyone around"},{"lineNumber":12554,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジックを、ゼスを支えるだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"would support Magic and Zeth."},{"lineNumber":12555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でなければ自らが危ういからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Otherwise, they themselves will be in danger.\""},{"lineNumber":12556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":12557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今は、学ぶ時。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now is the time to learn."},{"lineNumber":12558,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジックにとって、踏むべき修羅場がここなのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the ordeal that Magic must go through.\""},{"lineNumber":12559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「建国王パセリの御代から、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since the reign of the founding king Parsley,"},{"lineNumber":12560,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスは圧力に対抗し、声を上げる者の国だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth has been a country that resists pressure and speaks out."},{"lineNumber":12561,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一時はそれを失いかけ、腐ったが……","translatedEnglishLine":"For a while, it nearly lost that and decayed..."},{"lineNumber":12562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なぁに。私の娘だ。問題は無いとも。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What of it. Then let's accomplish the other half of the goal"},{"lineNumber":12569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　果たしていくとするか」","translatedEnglishLine":"as well.\""},{"lineNumber":12570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そぅーーーーら！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sooo here!\""},{"lineNumber":12571,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おじいちゃんでちゅよーーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"Grandpa is hereeee!\" (baby talk)"},{"lineNumber":12572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　べろべろばーーーーあ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Blah blah blaah!\" (baby talk)"},{"lineNumber":12573,"originalJapaneseLine":"（赤ちゃん言葉のガンジー様……っ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"(Lord Gandhi speaking baby talk...!)"},{"lineNumber":12574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シュール……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"Surreal...!)"},{"lineNumber":12575,"originalJapaneseLine":"（可愛らしい………………うっとり）","translatedEnglishLine":"(So cute... utterly enchanted)"},{"lineNumber":12576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっはっは！　たかいたかーーーーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha! This one will become a big deal!\""},{"lineNumber":12582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、これが孫か……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, so this is a grandchild..."},{"lineNumber":12583,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジックの時とも、また違う……","translatedEnglishLine":"Different from when Magic was young as well..."},{"lineNumber":12584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よいものだ。はぁっはっはっはっは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"A fine thing. Hahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":12585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふあああああぁぁぁぁーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaaaaahhh!\""},{"lineNumber":12586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ……皆の者。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... everyone."},{"lineNumber":12587,"originalJapaneseLine":"　呼び立ててすまぬな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry to have called you all here.\""},{"lineNumber":12588,"originalJapaneseLine":"その日。","translatedEnglishLine":"That day."},{"lineNumber":12589,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスの高官達は前触れもなく呼び出され、","translatedEnglishLine":"The high officials of Zeth were summoned without warning,"},{"lineNumber":12590,"originalJapaneseLine":"一堂に会していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and gathered all together."},{"lineNumber":12591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずいぶん急に呼ばれたけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We were called in quite suddenly..."},{"lineNumber":12592,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何の話？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What's the matter?\""},{"lineNumber":12593,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私にも、まったく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I have no idea either...\""},{"lineNumber":12594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「四天王総呼び出しですし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Four Heavenly Kings have all been summoned."},{"lineNumber":12595,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よほどの大事なのでしょうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"It must be something very important.\""},{"lineNumber":12596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほっほ。おかげでちょっぴり、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hoho. Thanks to that, I've been a bit busy"},{"lineNumber":12597,"originalJapaneseLine":"　調整が忙しかったですな」","translatedEnglishLine":"with arrangements.\""},{"lineNumber":12598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えぇと……私も呼ばれたのですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um... I was called as well, but..."},{"lineNumber":12599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうしてでしょう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder why...\""},{"lineNumber":12600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なんで俺まで呼ばれるんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Why am I even being called?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国の国主を並べても、リア女王の政治手腕は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you line up the rulers of the various countries, Queen Lia's political skill

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭ひとつふたつ、抜けている」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stands out by one or two heads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでも……ゼスのことを思えば、
マジック様に踏ん張って頂く他ないかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think there's no choice but to have Lord Magic hold the line."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え……そうなの？」
「先々のことを考えればな。
ここで私が出張って差配してしまえば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I step forward and take charge here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十年後のゼスはどうなる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what will happen to Zeth ten years from now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦争は終わった。その後、各国が協調する中……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The war is over. Then, as the countries cooperate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新王マジックは必ず、こう言われるだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The new King Magic will surely be told this:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『あの大変な戦争で何もしなかった者が』とな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'He who did nothing during that terrible war.'"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今ならば、周囲のあらゆる者が、
マジックを、ゼスを支えるだろう。
でなければ自らが危ういからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Otherwise, they themselves will be in danger."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今は、学ぶ時。
マジックにとって、踏むべき修羅場がここなのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the ordeal that Magic must go through."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「建国王パセリの御代から、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since the reign of the founding king Parsley,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスは圧力に対抗し、声を上げる者の国だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth has been a country that resists pressure and speaks out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時はそれを失いかけ、腐ったが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a while, it nearly lost that and decayed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なぁに。私の娘だ。問題は無いとも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What of it. She is my daughter. There is no problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぁっはっはっは！」
「ううぅ……うあぁあ……」
ガンジーの高笑いに、眠っている赤ん坊達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Gandhi's loud laughter, the sleeping babies

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目を覚まし、ぐずり始めた。
「ガンジー様。お子様達が」
「おぉ。ではもう半分の目的を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. Then let's accomplish the other half of the goal

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 果たしていくとするか」
「そぅーーーーら！
おじいちゃんでちゅよーーー！
べろべろばーーーーあ！」
（赤ちゃん言葉のガンジー様……っ……！
シュール……！）
（可愛らしい………………うっとり）
「はっはっは！　たかいたかーーーーい！」
「うっ、あっ……ふあああぁぁぁぁぁあーーー！」
三メートル近い高さまで一気に持ち上げられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lifted all at once to nearly three meters high,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌが泣き始める。
「はっはっは！
元気のいい！　大物になるぞ、これは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Full of spirit! This one will become a big deal!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、これが孫か……
マジックの時とも、また違う……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Different from when Magic was young as well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よいものだ。はぁっはっはっはっは！」
「ふあああああぁぁぁぁーーーー！」
「うむ……皆の者。
呼び立ててすまぬな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry to have called you all here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その日。
ゼスの高官達は前触れもなく呼び出され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The high officials of Zeth were summoned without warning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一堂に会していた。
「ずいぶん急に呼ばれたけど……
何の話？」
「私にも、まったく……」
「四天王総呼び出しですし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Four Heavenly Kings have all been summoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よほどの大事なのでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It must be something very important."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほ。おかげでちょっぴり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hoho. Thanks to that, I've been a bit busy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 調整が忙しかったですな」
「えぇと……私も呼ばれたのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... I was called as well, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてでしょう……」
「……なんで俺まで呼ばれるんだ。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「ふあああああぁぁぁぁーーーー！」
「うむ……皆の者。
呼び立ててすまぬな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry to have called you all here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その日。
ゼスの高官達は前触れもなく呼び出され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The high officials of Zeth were summoned without warning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一堂に会していた。
「ずいぶん急に呼ばれたけど……
何の話？」
「私にも、まったく……」
「四天王総呼び出しですし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Four Heavenly Kings have all been summoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よほどの大事なのでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It must be something very important."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっほ。おかげでちょっぴり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hoho. Thanks to that, I've been a bit busy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 調整が忙しかったですな」
「えぇと……私も呼ばれたのですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um... I was called as well, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてでしょう……」
「……なんで俺まで呼ばれるんだ。
